description.title: Finding moments of freedom
description.text: In my dance teaching I wish to create spaces where we can together sharpen our tools for finding moments of freedom, togetherness and self expression. I believe that the easiest way there is with a soft and warm environment, both inner and outer environment. Therefore a big part of my work is to soften the inner critique, to allow the body to move as we would if we had never learned that there was a less correct way to express oneself, as we would if we were free.

education.program: Aktiv ledarskap i skolan, ALIS (Active leadership at school)

projects.title: Good Vibes East (Zodiak)
projects.description: A youth project combining different art forms with an aim to create an encouraging, creative and warm working environment. This work resulted in a video piece created by Wanda Holopainen, Sophia Mitiku, Rosaliina Englund, Ama Kyei and the participating youth. For more info of this piece, please go to the 'Choreographer' section.

projects.title: Workshops
projects.description: In Helsinki (Jyväskylä at Soldidart Festival) and Stockholm (Daglig träning, Åsa folkhögskola).

projects.title: Linje 13
projects.description: A project at Botkyrka Kulturskola to gather youth in Hallunda and Norsborg to culture activities and to create a performance in collaboration with music, animation and a theater pedagog.

projects.title: Workshops
projects.description: In Helsinki, Espoo, Vantaa, Oulu (Finland), Jönköping, Stockholm, Östersund, Uppsala, Nyköping (Sweden), Tallinn (Estonia), Freiburg (Germany), Trondheim (Norway), Skapande skola (Stockholm), Danscentrum daglig träning coach (Stockholm).

projects.title: Weekly dance classes
projects.description: Helsinki: dance.fi, Helsingin aikuisopisto and DCA. Stockholm: Danshuset, Kulturskolan, Fryshuset högstadiet.
